project_abstract.cdata: The proposed project would consist of the construction of a low earth-filled dam on the Finchaa River, a tributary of the Blue Nile, approximately 170 Km northwest of Addis Ababa and a power station equipped with three 33.3 MW generators. An associated 220 KV transmission line would be constructed, together with a 105 MVA terminal substation near Addis Ababa.
